incidents.name: Error when purchasing HubSpot phone number

incident_updates.body: HubSpot software is now working for all users. We’ve identified and addressed the cause of the issue as a problem with a third-party provider that HubSpot uses to generate and purchase the numbers. The incident has now been fully resolved.

As of 1:40 PM EST, all customers attempting to acquire a HubSpot phone number will see an error stating “There was a problem acquiring this number. Please try again.” This error will prevent the successful creation of a HubSpot phone number. 
You may be able to self-resolve this error by trying the “Get this number” button again. This is happening due to degraded service from a third-party provider that HubSpot uses to generate and purchase the number.

More details are available on our provider’s site: https://status.twilio.com/

incidents.name: Some portals with Zoom Integration unable to generate Zoom link in Meetings invite is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: We have identified and addressed the root cause of some meetings invites not generating a Zoom link. The incident has been fully resolved and all links should be working properly.
We have addressed the issue that caused some meetings invites to not generate a Zoom link. We are monitoring performance closely to make sure all the links recover properly.

We have identified a way that some portals were able to add Zoom as the meeting location in their meeting scheduling page without a needed accountId.
Our team is actively running a process to resolve this issue. 

Affected portals should start to see links being resolved throughout the day. 

Affected customers can choose to resolve this for themselves, rather than waiting for our process to finish running if an immediate fix is needed. 
Please use the suggested workaround to resolve this issue on your own:
Navigate to Sales > Meetings and select Edit on any impacted meetings scheduling pages. On the Overview tab, remove Zoom from the Location field and then re-add Zoom to the Location field. Save your changes.
We will update you when meetings scheduling page's Zoom links have all been fixed.

Some portals may see that the Zoom link is not appearing in their HubSpot Meetings invite sent to customers. Our team is working to resolve this, but in the interim, HubSpot users with access to Meetings links can take the following steps to resolve: First, select "Sales" in the navigation menu, then select "Meetings." Second, hover over the affected meetings link and select "Edit." Once able to edit, remove the Zoom link from the "Location" field. Lastly, re-enter the Zoom link in the "Location" field on the desired meeting and save your changes.

incidents.name: Some HubSpot customers may have trouble loading HubSpot and HubSpot hosted pages

incident_updates.body:
HubSpot and HubSpot hosted webpages are fully functional. HubSpot hosted webpages and HubSpot's web app were intermittently inaccessible for some customers from 11:53 AM EDT to 2:58 PM EDT The incident was caused by an external vendor HubSpot works with to surface both our app and hosted pages. 

See Cloudflare's status page for further information. https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/kdpqngcbbn25

Starting at 11:53, HubSpot and some HubSpot hosted website pages are intermittently unavailable to some HubSpot customers. We are monitoring the situation closely. 

For further information please see https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/kdpqngcbbn25

Starting at 11:53, HubSpot and some HubSpot hosted website pages are intermittently unavailable to some HubSpot customers. We are investigating and monitoring the impact. 

For further information please see https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/kdpqngcbbn25
Starting at 11:53 AM EDT, HubSpot and some HubSpot hosted website pages are intermittently unavailable to some HubSpot customers. We are investing the root cause.

incidents.name: Some users in Europe are unable to make outbound calls

incident_updates.body: Outbound calling is now fully functional. We’ve identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and outbound calling should be working properly. No data has been lost.

We have identified and addressed the root cause of this issue and are continuing to monitor the situation to ensure outbound calling is working as expected. If you are still having difficulty placing outbound calls, please refresh your page and try again.

Some users in Europe are unable to make outbound calls from HubSpot. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information. "Call From Phone" still works so anyone can still use that feature to make calls.

Update: We are continuing to investigate this issue. Please monitor this page for further updates.

incidents.name: Some one-to-one emails are not for sending

incident_updates.body: Email is now fully functional. We’ve identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and emails should be working properly. No data has been lost.

We’ve addressed the issue that caused some scheduled or real-time one-to-one emails to not send from 11:30 AM EDT to 11:55 AM EDT. Customers can now schedule new emails and send real-time emails. All scheduled emails were eventually sent, there may have been a small delay. We’re monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly. No data has been lost.
Some one-to-one emails aren't sending right now, including scheduled emails. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: HubSpot is currently unavailable for some customers.

incident_updates.body: As of 7:30 PM EDT time, HubSpot is now working for all users. Between 1:50 PM and 3:35 PM EDT on October 6, 2022, HubSpot was unavailable for some users. Document visits were not tracked during this window, but no other data was lost. Between 3:35 PM and 7:30 PM EDT time, there were some processing lags in tools like forms, web analytics, and lists, and all systems are now fully operational.

HubSpot is now loading properly. Some processing in tools like Web Analytics, Lists, and Forms may still be lagged, but the root cause has been resolved. We’re monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

HubSpot is now loading properly. From 1:50 PM to 3:35 PM EDT HubSpot was unavailable for some users. Document visits were not tracked during this window. No other data was lost. Some systems such as Web Analytics may still be catching up. We’re monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.
Most areas of HubSpot are now loading properly, however, there may still be intermittent issues for some customers. We have identified the cause and are working on a resolution.
Update - Most areas of HubSpot are now loading properly, however, there may still be intermittent issues for some customers. We are continuing to investigate this issue.

incidents.name: Some workflow actions are currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Rotate owner and property management workflow actions are no longer experiencing delays. We’ve identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 1:35 PM EDT on September 29th, 2022. The issue is now fully resolved. No data was lost.

We’ve addressed the issue that was causing some workflow action delays of up to 75 minutes, starting at 1:35 PM EDT on September 29th, 2022. These delays were impacting rotate owner and property management actions in HubSpot. We’re monitoring the tools closely to ensure all processes recover properly.

We are still addressing the issue that is causing workflow rotate owner and property management actions in HubSpot to experience delays. Most impacted customers are now seeing delays of less than 10 minutes. We will update this page when we have more information.

We are still addressing the issue that is causing workflow rotate owner and property management actions in HubSpot to experience delays of up to 75 minutes for some customers, starting at 1:35 PM EDT on September 29, 2022. Most impacted customers are now seeing delays of 10-20 minutes. We will update this page when we have more information.

We’ve identified the issue that caused workflow rotate owner and property management actions in HubSpot to be experiencing delays of up to 75 minutes for some customers, starting at 1:35 PM EDT on September 29, 2022. Most impacted customers are now seeing delays of 10-20 minutes. We’re addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

Workflow rotate owner and property management actions in HubSpot are still experiencing delays of up to 75 minutes for some customers. Most impacted customers are now seeing delays of 10-20 minutes. Our team is still investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

Workflow rotate owner and property management actions in HubSpot are still experiencing delays of up to 75 minutes for some customers. Our team is still investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

incidents.name: Public objects API was unusable from 11:11 AM to 1:37 PM

incident_updates.body: All Public Object API calls, specifically requests to `crm/v3/objects`, between 11:11 AM ET and 1:37 PM ET on Thursday, August 25, 2022 ET, would have failed due to an incorrect routing configuration. Any calls that failed during that time will need to be retried by integrations and users intending to read or write data via that API. As of 1:37 PM, the public objects API is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Conversations Inbox is unavailable for all customers

incident_updates.body: HubSpot Support through Live Chat and Conversations is now fully available. There was minor and limited impact to Live Chat and Conversations for some HubSpot customers in their HubSpot portals that has been fully resolved. No messages were lost, and live chat is working as expected in all customer portals.

Upon investigation, this incident impacted access to HubSpot Support through Live Chat and Conversations. There was minor and limited impact to Live Chat or Conversations for some HubSpot customers in their HubSpot portals. No messages were lost, and Conversations is working as expected in all customer portals.

We’re monitoring the resolution, and access to HubSpot Support through Live Chat is recovering.
New HubSpot Conversations are currently unavailable. Existing conversations will continue as expected, but the live chat widget for new incoming conversations has been disabled while we investigate.

HubSpot Conversations are currently unavailable. Existing conversations will continue as expected, but the live chat widget for new incoming conversations has been disabled while we investigate. Beginning 10:50AM ET, new HubSpot Conversations are currently unavailable. Existing conversations will continue as expected, but the live chat widget for new incoming conversations has been disabled while we investigate.
Conversations Inbox isn't available right now. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Marketing email, pages and blogging tools, and knowledge base tools are unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Marketing email, pages, blogging, and knowledge base tools are now fully accessible. We’ve identified and addressed the root cause of the issue that resulted in issues within these tools for some customers between 6:30 PM EDT and 9:15 PM EDT on August 8, 2022. The incident has been fully resolved.

We’ve addressed the issue that has caused marketing email, pages, blogging, and knowledge base tools to be unavailable in some customers' accounts since 6:30 PM EDT on August 8, 2022. We’re monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

We’ve identified the issue that’s caused marketing email, pages and blogging tools, and knowledge base tools to be unavailable for some customers since 6:30 PM EDT on August 8, 2022. We’re addressing the cause of this issue and will continue to update this page when we have more information.

Some customers are experiencing errors or issues when loading marketing email, pages and blogging tools, and knowledge base tools in their HubSpot accounts. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue. We'll update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: The HubSpot software is intermittently unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: HubSpot software is now working for all users and the incident has now been fully resolved.

Our third-party CDN provider, Cloudflare, has addressed the issue that’s been preventing HubSpot software from loading. We’re monitoring performance to ensure the app recovers properly. 

There are still some delays in process recovery across affected regions, however most processes, including login, should be stabilising.

HubSpot is currently unavailable. We’ve identified the cause of widespread internet unavailability and delays with our third-party content delivery network provider, Cloudflare.

Cloudflare has reported a fix was implemented to an issue causing widespread internet unavailability and delays. We’re monitoring closely to ensure all processes recover properly in affected regions.

Learn More on Cloudflare Status Page
https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/

incidents.name: Some customers are unable to send 1 to 1 emails from contact records.

incident_updates.body:
We have resolved the issue that prevented some customers from sending 1 to 1 emails or starting new sequences from contact records between 5:13 PM and 6:04 PM ET on June 17. In-progress sequences and emails sent through the HubSpot Sales Extensions were not impacted.

The incident has been fully resolved and all users should be able to send new emails and sequences from contact records.
We are investigating reports that some customers are unable to send 1 to 1 emails from contact records.

incidents.name: Web and traffic analytics is currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Web and traffic analytics is no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 2:36 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jun 1, 2022 as a problem with our Acceptance Tests. The issue is now fully resolved.

We've addressed the issue that was causing Web and traffic analytics delays of up to 4 hours starting at 2:36 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jun 1, 2022. We're monitoring the tools closely to ensure all processes recover properly.

We've identified the cause of the Web and traffic analytics delays of up to 4 hours since 2:36 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jun 1, 2022. These delays may impact tools such as Reports and Dashboards in HubSpot. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

components.name: Reports
components.description: Loading of reports, dashboards, and analytics event processing.

incidents.name: Customers or Apps using Workflow information via the API are seeing zero contacts in the list count

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We’ve identified the cause of the list processing delay of up to two hours since 4:30 EST on 05/26/2022. These delays impacted customers and apps using workflow information via the API and led to a list count of zero users. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when the issue is resolved.

components.name: HubSpot APIs
components.description: The HubSpot APIs include connections to Contacts, Analytics, Workflows, Reports, Forms, and more.

incidents.name: CRM Object updates are currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Between 8:15 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on 05/04/2022 and 1:05 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on 05/04/2022, some customers experienced issues with CRM Object updates. This was caused by a problem with indexing. Due to a related system also being impaired, it took us longer than anticipated to recover. As of 1:05 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on 05/04/2022, CRM Object updates are working properly and the incident has been fully resolved. No data was lost.

Beginning at 8:15 AM ET, CRM Object updates in HubSpot have been experiencing delays of up to 35 minutes. This may impact tools such as indexing pages and pipeline overviews in HubSpot. No data has been lost. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

incidents.name: HubSpot’s Integration Cards were unavailable for all customers

incident_updates.body: Between 12:17 pm and 1:34 pm on Tuesday, April 26, 2022 ET, customers experienced issues with HubSpot's Integration Cards. This may have impacted the integration cards on Contact, Company, Deal and Ticket records within HubSpot. As of 1:34 pm ET, HubSpot’s CRM Cards API is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved. No data was lost.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Ads is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: LinkedIn Ads is now fully accessible. We’ve identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and LinkedIn Ads should be working properly. No data has been lost.

We are continuing to work on a fix for the issue that is causing LinkedIn Ads to be unavailable for some customers since 07:03 EST on Friday, April 1st. While we work on addressing this issue, customers may post ads directly on LinkedIn. We will continue to update this page as new information emerges.

We are continuing to work on addressing an issue that has caused LinkedIn Ads to be unavailable for some customers since 07:03 EST on Friday, April 1st. We will update this page when we have more information.

We’ve identified an issue that’s caused LinkedIn Ads to be unavailable for some customers since 07:03 EST on Friday, April 1st. We’re addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

components.name: Marketing Tools
components.description: Loading and data processing of Marketing tools like Ads, Email, Social, Forms and Lists.

incidents.name: Some deals not showing in dashboard view or reporting

incident_updates.body: Deals are now available in the list view, board view and reports again. We’ve identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and deals are showing as expected. No data has been lost.

We’ve addressed the issue that caused some deals to be unavailable in list view, board view and reports since approximately 1:50am EST
on March 30th. We’re monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.
We are continuing to investigate the root cause of this issue. No data has been lost.
Beginning March 30 at 1:50am EST some HubSpot users reported that they were unable to see some deals in list view and board view, as well as in some reports. We are currently investigating the issue.

incidents.name: HubSpot Calling is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: HubSpot Calling is now working for all users. Twilio has addressed the issue that caused HubSpot Calling to be unavailable since 11 AM EST, and the incident has now been fully resolved.
Twilio has addressed the issue that caused HubSpot Calling to be unavailable since 11 AM EST. We’re monitoring closely to ensure that HubSpot tools are functioning as expected.

Customers using HubSpot Calling may be experiencing connection issues while starting a call. We've identified the issue as an outage with Twilio. The status of the issue can be found on their incident page (https://status.twilio.com/incidents/4tmltsk3wx75). We are actively working with them to resolve this issue, and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Objects records failed to load in HubSpot

incident_updates.body:
Contact and Company records in HubSpot were not available for users with the LinkdenIn Sales Navigator between 10:50 AM and 11:28 AM ET.

We identified and resolved the cause of this issue. All record types are now loading as expected.

incidents.name: Marketing Emails were previously delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Marketing Emails are no longer experiencing delays. We’ve identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 3 am EST on Tuesday 8th March. Some emails may have experience delays of up to 1hr between 3 am and 4.30 am EST but we are not aware of any sending failures or loss of data.  The issue is now fully resolved.
We’ve addressed and resolved the issue that was causing Marketing Email delays of up to 1 hour starting at 4am EST today. We’re monitoring the tools closely to ensure all processes recover properly.

incidents.name: Contacts were unavailable for some customers between 3:37 and 3:54pm ET

incident_updates.body: Contacts data is now fully accessible. Some customers were experiencing delays between the times of 3:37 to 3:54pm ET on contact views, records, and some reports. We’ve identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and your contacts should be working properly. No data has been lost.

incidents.name: Search is not working for some customers.

incident_updates.body: Between 9:30 AM EST and 11:59 AM EST, search within the global navigation bar did not work properly for some HubSpot customers. Our team identified and fixed the issue, and as of 11:59 AM EST, search should be working properly.
A fix has been implemented, and we are monitoring the results.
We have identified the issue, and we are working to resolve the it as quickly as possible.
Our team is still investigating this issue and working to resolve it as quickly as possible.

Search results are not loading for some HubSpot customers. This is only impacting global search in the top navigation bar, not search with apps such as on individual CRM records or the file manager. Our team is investigating the issue and working to resolve it as quickly as possible.

incidents.name: HubSpot is slow to load for some customers

incident_updates.body: Between 4:37 PM and 6:10 PM EST, some customers on the West Coast of the United States had loading or timeout issues in HubSpot due to an outage on our third-party cloud platform, Cloudflare. Cloudflare has resolved the root cause of the issue, and all tools in HubSpot should now load properly. You can follow the issue here: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/d4g3q6bqzfnr.

As of 6:10 PM EST, Cloudflare has reported that their systems are recovering. We’re monitoring the issue closely to ensure all HubSpot tools recover properly. You can follow the issue here: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/d4g3q6bqzfnr.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

As of 6:10 PM EST, Cloudflare has reported that their systems are recovering. We're monitoring the issue closely to ensure all HubSpot tools recover properly. You can follow the issue here: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/d4g3q6bqzfnr.

incidents.name: The Jira integration is not working for some users

incident_updates.body:
This issue is now resolved.

At 5:00 AM EST today, the Jira integration disconnected for some customers. As of 10:43 AM EST, our team has resolved the underlying issue.

To continue using the integration, please 'reconnect' the integration in Settings on the Integrations 'Connected apps' page - https://app.hubspot.com/l/integrations-settings/installed  

IMPORTANT: Do not 'reinstall' the integration from the App Marketplace, as this will cause you to lose integration settings and your Jira data in HubSpot.
We are currently testing our fix and monitoring to ensure it works correctly. We will update you as soon as we have validated this. Thanks again for your patience.
We are working to implement our fix for this issue. We hope to have this resolved very soon. Thanks again for your patience. We will keep you updated
We are still working on our fix for this issue. We hope to have this resolved shortly. Thanks again for your patience and we will follow up shortly to keep you updated!
Thanks for your patience. We have indentified the issues and are working on a fix. We will keep you posted as we progress with this.
Thanks for your patience as we continue to investigate this issue. We are working on this and will keep you posted on our progress.
The Jira integration isn’t available right now. We’re investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Knowledge Base pages were unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Between 10:15 AM EST and 10:28 AM EST on February 8, 2022, some customers experienced issues with viewing their Knowledge Base pages. As of 10:28 AM EST on February 8, 2022, Knowledge Base pages are working properly and functioning as expected. Our team identified and resolved the root cause of the issue, and no data was lost.

incidents.name: HubSpot is currently unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: This issue is now resolved. From 9:10am to 11:30am EST, some customers experienced issues loading HubSpot tools. We identified the root cause of the problem as an issue with Cloudflare, our third-party cloud vendor, and worked with them to resolve.

We’ve fixed the issue that’s been preventing HubSpot tools from loading for some customers. We are working closely with Cloudflare, our third-party cloud vendor, to ensure this fix leads to full resolution and are continuing to closely monitor the situation.

We’ve identified the issue that’s been preventing HubSpot tools from loading for some customers since 9:10am EST on February 7. We are working closely with Cloudflare, our third-party cloud vendor, to address the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.
We have identified the cause of this issue and are actively working to resolve.
CRM records and apps within HubSpot are unable to load for some customers. We are actively investigating the cause of this issue.

incidents.name: Link tracking is unavailable for some emails for some customers.

incident_updates.body:
Link tracking is now fully operational.

The incident has been resolved and recipients of emails sent from HubSpot are able to successfully click links and load images.

We are seeing improvement in the Cloudflare issue that is preventing link tracking for some emails sent from HubSpot.

Unsubscribe links are now working as expected. We are continuing to monitor the improvement on link tracking and image loading errors.

We’ve identified the cause of the issue that’s been preventing link tracking for some emails sent from HubSpot as an issue with Cloudflare, a 3rd party network provider.

This issue continues to impact link tracking on some links, image loading in Marketing email, and the availability of subscription links. 

We’re addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

Link tracking in some emails is unavailable for some HubSpot customers.

Email recipients might see CloudFlare 500 errors while attempting to open links sent from HubSpot Marketing email or 1 to 1 sales emails via the HubSpot CRM.

Subscription links in all HubSpot emails beginning at 1:23 pm ET are unavailable.

No data has been lost and all tracking events will be recoverable once the issue is resolved.

incidents.name: HubSpot automation experienced delays for some customers.

incident_updates.body:
Beginning at 6:15 am ET on December 23, HubSpot automation experienced delays of up to 45 minutes. This impacted Workflow enrollment and execution, post-form submission follow-up emails, and feedback surveys.

All delays were resolved at 8:50 am ET.

No data has been lost, and all delayed actions will be successfully retried.
